actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income any gain from the sale of real property to a redevelopment agency of a State or local Government.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income gain from the sale or exchange of real property to a State or local redevelopment authority if such property is within an area selected for redevelopment or rehabilitation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income any gain from the sale of real property to a redevelopment agency of a State or local Government.
